Package models.GameContext

Class GameContext

java.lang.Object
models.GameContext.GameContext
public class GameContext extends Object
The GameContext class holds the global state of the game, including the current map, players, and game phase. It serves as a centralized point of access for different components of the game to interact with and modify the game state.
